DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of the present study was to explore the weaning failure rate from invasive mechanical ventilation and to identify risk factors of weaning failure.
DOC.brief_title: Weaning Outcome From Invasive Mechanical Ventilation
DOC.criteria: Requiring endotracheal intubation and invasive mechanical ventilation Duration of invasive mechanical ventilation < 48 hours； Presence of tracheostomy； Presence of upper airway obstruction.
